Text:
Is it just me or is this tracker damaged?

I have donwloaded the torrent to 100% but only 5 of the 17 episodes work!

And an even more weird thing is that the archive containing the episodes shows 1,55 GB, while each separate file shows about 250Mb each!

250*17 is about 4,5GB. The videofiles not working, doesn't have any alternatives when right clicking and can't be opened with any mediaplayer, nor fixed with a avi repair program. 

Does anybody else have the same problem?
well doz all the episodes work or not?????
